attributes.action: RETURN THE JOINT CLAIM FOR UN-EMPLOYED COUPLES, AND INCREASE THE BENEFIT FROM £50 PER PERSON TO A MORE REALISTIC LEVEL OF PAYMENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A unemployed couple living together are currently paid £50 per person each week,whereas if classed as single claiments they would each receive £64 per person per week a vast difference to that couple. this happened to us when we were forced to sign a joint agreement, we lost, jointly £56 per fortnight. people simply can not live on this amount and it is about time government recognised this fact.people have to pay for food, electric, clothes and much more ,all from £50 per week. for example the £56 per week, if returned by the government would help cover the extortionate electric bill, or by decent food items, we neither need, nor require luxuries, but if out of work need a decent amount of money to live on.
